author: mavster04
title: Vaccine Management Platform + APIs
description: Authenticity of paper-based vaccine certification is hard to verify. Managing & monitoring them on a city-wide level is equally difficult.
solution: Our health solutions will provide: (a) Vaccine Information System for Doctors, (b) Vaccine Verification Platform, (c)APIs for Devs
experience: We've been developing healthcare solutions since 2016, see www.mycure.md. Also, we created comprehensive healthcare APIs, www.hapihub.com.
